abstract: The status of the audio renderer.
overview:
## Discussion

A renderer begins with a status of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/unknown]. As you add sample buffers to the queue for rendering, the renderer transitions to either [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/rendering] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/failed].

If the status is `AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus.failed`, check the value of the renderer’s error property for information on the error encountered. This property is key value observable.

# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the audio renderer.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

A renderer begins with a status of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/unknown]. As you add sample buffers to the queue for rendering, the renderer transitions to either [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/rendering] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus/failed].

If the status is `AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus.failed`, check the value of the renderer’s error property for information on the error encountered. This property is key value observable.

## Determining rendering status

- **AVQueuedSampleBufferRenderingStatus**: The statuses for sample buffer rendering.
